resource.description: A signing profile is a signing template that can be used to carry out a pre-defined signing job.

properties.name: SignatureValidityPeriod
properties.description: Signature validity period of the profile.

type.description: Signature validity period of the profile.

properties.name: PlatformId
properties.description: The ID of the target signing platform.

type.description: The ID of the target signing platform.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A list of tags associated with the signing profile.

type.description: A list of tags associated with the signing profile.

attributes.description: A signing profile is a signing template that can be used to carry out a pre-defined signing job.

properties.name: ProfileName
properties.description: A name for the signing profile. AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the signing profile name.

type.description: A name for the signing profile. AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the signing profile name.

properties.name: ProfileVersion
properties.description: A version for the signing profile. AWS Signer generates a unique version for each profile of the same profile name.

type.description: A version for the signing profile. AWS Signer generates a unique version for each profile of the same profile name.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified signing profile.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified signing profile.

properties.name: ProfileVersionArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified signing profile version.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified signing profile version.
